section.name: Installing Custom Parsers
section.p: The InfoQuiver distribution contains a little commandline tool called "ParserInstaller". It makes the installation of new parsers as simple as it's possible in InfoQuivers current development stage.

ul.li:
fTorque: specifies the path to the configuration file with settings for the persistence layer
As long as you are not a InfoQuiver developer this setting should be PathToInfoQuiverInstallDir/conf/torque.properties
class: specifies the class containing your transport implementation, eg. net.sf.iquiver.samples.parser.SimpleParsert
name: specifies a name for your parser, eg. "SimpleParser"
